text: Ani te loka tyata (jahannamamadhye) mothamothyane oradatila ki he amacya palanakartya! Amhala (yatuna) bahera kadha amhi cangale karma karu, tya karmankherija, je amhi karita hoto (allaha pharmavila) ki kaya amhi tumhala evadhe ayusya dile navhate ki jyala samajuna ghyayace asate, to samaju sakata hota1 ani tumacyajavala khabaradara karanarahi pohacala hota,2 tevha ata godi cakha (asa) julami atyacari lokanca konihi sahayya karanara nahi
